title: Rick Perlstein On Reagan's Invisible Bridge
teaser: The new book The Invisible Bridge: The Fall of Nixon and the Rise of Reagan explores the time of American history when it seemed everyone was on the verge of a nervous breakdown. We'll hear from the author about what motivated him to write about the tumultuous political and economic times of the 1970s.
